EMERGENCY ONLY.","params":{"_pid":"pool id"}},"harvestPendingReward(uint256)":{"details":"harvest reward tokens from BidFarm and update pool variables","params":{"_pid":"pool id"}},"migrate(uint256)":{"details":"Migrate pool token to another pool token contract. Can be called by anyone. We trust that migrator contract is good.","params":{"_pid":"the pool id"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pendingRewardToken(uint256,address)":{"details":"calculates reward tokens of a user with repect to pool id","params":{"_pid":"the pool id","_user":"the user who is calls this function"},"returns":{"_0":"pending reward token of a user"}},"poolLength()":{"details":"gets the previous rewards of user so that we can add more rewards to it and save","returns":{"_0":"total number of pools"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setAll(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"owner can set multiple values at once so it may save gas cost","params":{"_endRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution ends","_rewardFrozenTime":"the block at which user can harvest reward","_rewardToken":"the token in which rewards are given","_rewardTokenPerBlock":"rewards distributed per block to community or users","_startRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution starts","_unstakeFrozenTime":"the block at which user can unstake"}},"setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"it can change weight of pool with repect to other pools","params":{"_allocPoint":"The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.","_pid":"pool id","_withUpdate":"if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked"}},"setEndRewardBlock(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set end reward block","params":{"_endRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution ends"}},"setMigrator(address)":{"details":"owner can set a migrator contract to migrate pool tokens","params":{"_migrator":"the migrator contract"}},"setRewardFrozenTime(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set reward frozen time","params":{"_rewardFrozenTime":"the block at which user can harvest reward"}},"setRewardToken(address)":{"details":"owner can set reward token","params":{"_rewardToken":"the token in which rewards are given"}},"setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set reward token per block","params":{"_rewardTokenPerBlock":"rewards distributed per block to community or users"}},"setStartRewardBlock(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set start reward block","params":{"_startRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution starts"}},"setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set unstake frozen time","params":{"_unstakeFrozenTime":"the block at which user can unstake"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdraw(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"withdraw or unstake pool tokens from BidFarm","params":{"_amount":"how many pool tokens you want to unstake","_pid":"pool id"}},"withdrawRewardTokensFromContract(uint256)":{"details":"owner can withdraw reward token from contract","params":{"_amount":"amount of reward tokens"}}},"stateVariables":{"MAX_UINT":{"details":"max number used to set some variable like reward ending block initially"},"endRewardBlock":{"details":"The block number when REWARD_TOKEN distribution stops."},"pendingRewardOf":{"details":"exmaple: user_address  =>  ( pool_id => UsersPendingReward)"},"poolInfo":{"details":"Info of each pool."},"rewardFrozenTime":{"details":"No froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community."},"rewardToken":{"details":"The REWARD_TOKEN TOKEN!"},"rewardTokenPerBlock":{"details":"REWARD_TOKEN tokens created per block."},"startRewardBlock":{"details":"The block number when REWARD_TOKEN distribution starts."},"totalAllocPoint":{"details":"Total allocation poitns. Can only be called by the owner."},"addRewardTokensToContract(uint256)":{"notice":"owner puts reward tokens in contract"},"deposit(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"deposit tokens to get rewards"},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"get the tokens which user staked.
